sentence.text: Further, epidermis development heterozygous for either Magoh or Rbm8a exhibit aberrant neurogenesis and microcephaly.

Using a new conditional allele, we first show that mRNA splicing, via spliceosome haploinsufficiency phenocopies aberrant neurogenesis and microcephaly of nuclear-transcribed mRNA catabolic process, nonsense-mediated decay and Rbm8a mutant mice.

entity.text: nuclear-transcribed mRNA catabolic process, nonsense-mediated decay
